description: This file defines classes related to workflow memory management, including WorkflowRun and WorkflowMemory, using Pydantic models. It provides methods for serialization, adding runs, clearing memory, and deep copying the memory state.

classes.name: WorkflowRun
classes.description: Represents a single workflow execution with optional input data and response.

classes.name: WorkflowMemory
classes.description: Stores a list of WorkflowRun instances and provides methods to manipulate this collection.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Serializes the WorkflowMemory instance to a dictionary, excluding None values.

methods.name: add_run
methods.description: Adds a WorkflowRun instance to the runs list and logs the addition.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all stored WorkflowRun instances from memory.

methods.name: deep_copy
methods.description: Creates a deep copy of the WorkflowMemory instance, optionally updating it, and clears the new copy.
